description: amFilm (TM) Premium Screen Protector for Kindle Fire is made from superior quality 3-layer PET film, and specifically designed to fit Newest Kindle Fire. It effectively protects the screen from daily scratches, dust and scrapes. With self-adhering surface, the film is designed for easy application and zero-to-minimal bubbles during application. A bubble removal card is also included to remove the occasional bubble easily.Two screen protector films, micro-fiber cleaning cloth and bubble removal card are included.amFilm(TM) is a trademark and protected by US Trademark Law.PLEASE NOTE:This screen protector is for Kindle Fire Only, not for Kindle Fire HD. Please refer to following products for Kindle Fire HD 7":Clear (Invisible):ASIN: B0098OCKDEAnti-Glare (anti-fingerprint): ASIN: B0098O8VK0
title: amFilm® Kindle Fire (Previous Generation) HD Clear (Invisible) Premium Screen Protectors (2-Pack) [Lifetime Warranty]
